title: Suuri Kalliojärvi
description: A serene lake surrounded by rugged rock formations and pine forest, Suuri Kalliojärvi offers peaceful short hiking route around it in the heart of North Karelia’s wild nature.

title: Sompiojärvi
description: Nestled within the Sompio Strict Nature Reserve, Sompiojärvi is a pristine wilderness lake framed by fell scenery and ancient folklore sites, ideal for quiet canoeing and nature observation.

title: Kylmäluoma
description: A well-equipped outdoor area featuring deep forests, eskers, and clear fishing lakes, Kylmäluoma is perfect for hiking, canoeing, and family-friendly wilderness experiences.

title: Pyhä Nattanen
description: A striking fell with dramatic boulder formations, Pyhä-Nattanen offers a rewarding hike with panoramic views over tundra and lakes—especially stunning during autumn colors or midnight sun.

title: Patvinsuo
description: Known for its vast mires, old-growth forests, and clear lakes, Patvinsuo is a haven for birdwatchers, hikers, and canoeists looking to experience Finland’s diverse wetland ecosystems
